title: Linkedin Message Generator
original_prompt: Write a LinkedIn message to {Purpose:congratulate a connection on their recent promotion}. The message should show respect and send appreciation to the receiver.
input1: Hi [Connection's Name], I just saw the news about your promotion to [New Position] at [Company Name]! Congratulations on this well-deserved achievement. Your hard work and dedication truly inspire those around you. Wishing you all the best as you take on this new role!
